channel.title: [317] A cleaned up Stabbing Scape [317] {CHECK IT OUT!}
channel.description:
[center][font=verdana]Well i kinda thought I weed i did a half ass job of coding his server so i cleaned it up. Removed a bunch of shitty non working commands. Took out some customs. Fixed commands so no one lags when you use them Changed the Starter package.. He gave way to much good shit.. (I made it reasonable) I changed the chatbox spam... Got rid of any original websites that he had put in. Got rid of Player right messages like "WELCOME DUDE UR MOD!!?!?!?" And that kinda crap :P Change the server ip go to the client folder, go to client.java and search for "veilscape.no-ip.org" Change that to your ip.
Credits 80% I Weed I (His source/Client) 20% me.. Doing the dirty work :P I forgot to remove his porn shortcuts on the client :/ Song on the client "All that remains - Two weeks" Download link (All one big package)
Mediafire: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?en7yv5mvz09sn7a]http://www.mediafire.com/?en7yv5mvz09sn7a[/url]
Uppit: http://uppit.com/t425fg3vkrkx/Cleaner_Stabbing_Scape.rar
Extra Comments- I wouldn't recommend using this server if you actually want people to play. Sloppy ass coding, Looks like he tried to code this in under an hour or so ;) So why did i bother? I really have no clue. Just felt like making it a little bit better. No disrespect to I weed I intended. lol If anything i'd use this for practice coding... MAYBE.. It's extremely unorganized. But it's up to you.
Pics (The server will look different but here is the general idea) Rep me if you like :/[/font] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2j5xgnn.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2rmxu6u.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/fu7uhg.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2qvh9a8.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/zt85jb.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/dy2dc9.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/309kev8.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/1z34i6a.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/t8846t.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/xb0r3t.png[/img]
ALSO! If you want to remove his little porn shortcuts Go to the Client.java i beleive search "BOobs" And if you find it backspace it, Then search "Xnxx" Backspace that also. Then it disappears.. If you cant find this in client.java check gui.java Don't forget to Compile ;) [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1zow7ld.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.title: [317] A cleaned up Stabbing Scape [317] {CHECK IT OUT!}
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This is a lot of beginner stuff, I was even doing better than this when I first released Bronze Age. To be honest, this is not a worth while release. Plus the fact that this source is out dated, I usually love to look at the classic server’s but this is not some kind of exception.

Nevertheless, good luck with future releases.

Read full topic

If you douse a pile of shit in perfume, and put pretty little flowers on it, it’s still shit.

Lol, No kidding This was just practice… I really only did this to make it a little better, so noobs dont have to struggle as much… If you want me to make my own stuff i will eventually.
